metadata.name: Wish #2
metadata.description:
In Wish #1, a girl was holding a red balloon.

The red balloon expressed hope and wish to me.
And the girl blew a balloon into the sky, which expresses that she wished to heaven.

And what caught it is now the scene from Wish #2.
The rescue ship has arrived. Everyone must be happy.

Also, I actually had a hard time these days.
But while I was drawing Wish #2, I realized, "This is how fun drawing is."

This picture has the same meaning as a rescue line for me.

And
It's the description of the daisy flowers on her head.


Innocence, especially with white daisies with yellow or pale centers.
Purity – also shown by daisies that are as white as possible.
New beginnings, which is why they are often found in bouquets for new mothers or as gifts for children.
True love – because each daisy flower is really two flowers blended together in harmony.
That the sender can keep a secret. Keeping a secret is one way a person can exhibit that they truly love another.

silo

Wish , worked in 2022
